Package com.bizosys.hsearch.inpipe

Class Summary
ComputeIpHouse Deduce the Host IP address based on URL.
ComputeTokens Tokenize text content
ComputeUrlShortner Deduce the Host IP address based on URL.
DeleteFromDictionary Delete terms from dictionary
DeleteFromIndex Delete terms from the inverted index.
DeleteFromIndexWithCut In a merged index, delete only relevant document keywords
DeleteFromPreviewAndDetail Delete document from preview and detail record
FilterDuplicateId Delete an existing record before duplicating it.
FilterLowercase Convert the text to lower case.
FilterStandard Applies standard set of filters
FilterStem Stem the terms
FilterStopwords Eliminate stopwords from indexing.
FilterTermLength Any default any word less than 2 character or more than 200 character are eliminated.
InpipeLog Logger class for inpipe package.
NormalizeAccents Normalize accent from the content
PrintStdout Print the indexing details to console
RemoveBlankSpace Condense multiple blanks to a single blank.
RemoveCachedText Clears caches text from the index.
RemoveNonAscii Remove non-ascii words from the content
SaveToBufferedDictionary Persist to dictionary
SaveToDetail Persists to detail table
SaveToDictionary Persist to dictionary
SaveToIndex Saves the term vector to the index table
SaveToIndexBatch Saves the term vector to the index table in a batch mode.
SaveToPreview Persist to preview table
SaveToPreviewBatch Persist the record information in preview table.
TokenizeBase This is an abstract class which reads the various dimensions of the document and tokenizes them including ID, URL, Fields, Title.
TokenizeKeyword  
TokenizeNonEnglish A detail support is planned in future.
TokenizeStandard Standard Tokenizer
TokenizeWhiteSpace Tokenizes based on white space
